unnormalised: Okay, Bollywood Buzz is ON FIRE this week! Grab your chai and settle in, because the goss is piping hot, garam garam!
normalised: Okay, Bollywood Buzz is on fire this week! Grab your chai and settle in, because the goss is piping hot, garam garam!

unnormalised: First up, rumors are swirling around Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor. Spotted leaving designer Manish Malhotra's house late last night, looking all secretive. Are they gearing up for another big announcement? Maybe baby number two is on the cards? The grapevine says yes! Remember all the speculation before Raha was born? History repeating itself, maybe?

Are they gearing up for another big announcement? Maybe baby number two is on the cards? The grapevine says yes! Remember all the speculation before Raha was born? History repeating itself, maybe?

unnormalised: Then there’s the whole Ananya Pandey-Aditya Roy Kapur saga. Seems like their Goa getaway wasn't just for sun and sand. Insiders are saying things are getting serious. They were apparently spotted at a super exclusive restaurant in Candolim, holding hands and looking very much in love. Is this the real deal, or just another fleeting Bollywood romance? Only time will tell, but my bets are on "real deal" this time!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, everyone’s still talking about Deepika Padukone's stunning appearance at the Cannes Film Festival. Seriously, can she ever do anything wrong? That orange sari? *Chef's kiss*. And then there's Ranveer Singh, being his usual flamboyant self, stealing the show with his quirky outfits. These two are truly Bollywood royalty.

unnormalised: And speaking of food (because, let's be real, what's life without it?), I heard a hilarious story about Karan Johar trying to make biryani during his lockdown cooking phase. Apparently, it was a total disaster. He ended up ordering from a local restaurant in Bandra. Even the best directors have their off days, right?

unnormalised: Also, heard that Kiara Advani and Sidharth Malhotra are planning a big Diwali bash this year at their new bungalow in Juhu. Expecting all the big names from Bollywood. Guess who’s gonna be scrambling for an invite? Yep, yours truly! Wish me luck, friends! This is your girl, signing off! Stay tuned for more Bollywood masala next week! XOXO!
